entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -35.0°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -38.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
